titles.title: To resolve title issues involving real property and equipment acquired using funds provided under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program.
To resolve title issues involving real property and equipment acquired using funds provided under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, and Nutrition.

bill.summary: Vests title to real property and equipment acquired using funds provided by a grant under the Alaska Kiln Drying Grant Program in the grant recipient in accordance with the compensation provisions in this Act.
